name: Orla Tealeaf
description: A plump Halfling woman with a face full of laugh-lines and flour-smudges. She wears multiple, tattered wool aprons over a bright green dress. Her hair is tied into two messy, chestnut buns. She carries a massive iron ladle like a weapon and is constantly surrounded by the steam of a large, copper soup-kettle. She exudes a sense of overwhelming, motherly competence and smells of roasted onions and yeast.
bio: Orla ran the most popular inn in the Western Basin before the Spire raids. She now runs the refugee-kitchens, turning the meager rations of moss and grain into something resembling edible food. She is the colony's primary source of gossip and knows exactly who is sleeping with whomâ€”or who hasn't eaten in three days.
motivation: Keeping the 'Table of the Sovereignty' full, even if she has to cook the King's own boots.
